#summary How to check out naclports source code.

== Quick Links ==
[http://code.google.com/p/naclports/source/browse#svn/trunk/src/native_client Browse the code] |
[http://code.google.com/p/naclports/source/list Recent changes] | [https://chromium.googlesource.com/external/naclports/ Git Mirror]

== Prerequisites ==

You need to install [http://dev.chromium.org/developers/how-tos/install-depot-tools depot_tools] in order to use gclient.

== Create a Client View Directory ==

{{{
mkdir naclports
cd naclports
}}}

== Create a .gclient Configuration (git) ==

{{{
gclient config --name=src  https://chromium.googlesource.com/external/naclports.git
}}}

== Create a .gclient Configuration (svn) ==

{{{
gclient config http://naclports.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src
}}}

*Note:* If you are a naclports committer, you will want to check out a writeable version of the repo using this url: `https://naclports.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src`

== Sync to the repo ==
{{{
gclient sync
}}}
